summary: Round 1 issues resolved. Q1 FIXED (retry coverage consistent), Q2 NON-ISSUE (standard logging pattern). No new issues introduced.

notes.q1_status: FIXED - fetch_contact_org_id now uses _get() for retry
notes.q2_status: NON-ISSUE - logger initialization is standard Python practice
notes.q3_status: ACKNOWLEDGED - success logging after retry is nice-to-have, not blocking

notes.note: Async batch method has overly broad exception handling and no logging, but these are pre-existing issues not in scope for this PR
